oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Complete sets of elastic, dielectric, and piezoelectric properties of [001]-poled Pb(Zn(1/3)Nb(2/3))O(3)-(6-7)%PbTiO(3) single crystals of [110]-length cut
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHUKLA, R
RAJAN, KK
GANDHI, P
LIM, LC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: transducer
actuators
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: [001]-poled relaxor based ferroelectric Pb(Zn(1/3)Nb(2/3))O(3) - (6 - 7)%PbTiO(3) single crystals of [110]-length cut exhibit k(31)approximate to 0.85 and very high d(31)/s(11)(E) value. They are promising materials for sensors and actuators comprising an elastic substrate such as a metal shim or support, especially under dynamic loading conditions. In this work, the full sets of elastic, dielectric, and piezoelectric properties of [110](L) x [001](T)(P) single crystal are determined by means of the resonant technique. The obtained property matrix can be readily used for device design and simulation purposes. (c) 2008
